Description:
Hotel Adial is located on the central boulevard in Adjud and offers a restaurant serving Romanian cuisine, as well as a terrace and a playground with a swing and a slide. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area, wooden floors and a bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. Some rooms feature free air conditioning, while others have it available for a surcharge.

A la carte breakfast is available on request. Drinks are served at the on-site bar.

The Mausoleum of Marasesti is within 20 km and the Bogdana Monastery is 15 km away. The hotel offers a private parking with 30 places.

Description:
Located in the Cetate district of Alba Iulia, Hotel Hermes offers spacious rooms just 10 minutes walk from the fortified Alba Carolina centre. It features a restaurant and games room.

All en suite rooms have red carpeting, providing them with a warm ambiance. Each unit is equipped with heating, cable TV, free Wi-Fi and a minibar.

Each morning, a breakfast made of local ingredients is served at the hotels restaurant. In the evening, it offers a variety of Transylvanian and international meals, as well as beverages from its bar.

Guests can play billiards in Hotel Hermess games room. The reception desk is available 24/7 for room service or for organising transport to nearby sites of interest.

Hermes Hotel is located at the roundabout between the Military College and the Stadium. Free parking is available on site.

Description:
Located close to the south bank of the River Mures, Pensiunea Perla Muresului features free Wi-Fi and a restaurant serving traditional Romanian cuisine. Guestrooms have a private bathroom and TV.

Free private parking and a 24-hour reception desk are also offered at Pensiunea Perla Muresului. Guests can relax with a refreshing beverage on the hotels terrace.

Alba Iulia city centre is a 5-minute drive from Perla Muresului where many shops and bars can be found.

Description:
Situated in the historic centre of Alba Iulia, La Maison de Caroline is housed in a 19th century building. The Citadel of Alba Carolina is 600 metres away, while the Train Station is 1.8 km away.

All units come with LCD TV, private bathroom with shower and free toiletries, as well as with carpeted floors. Some rooms also feature air conditioning.

You can take advantage of the concierge service offered by La Maison de Caroline, where the personnel will be happy to assist you with making reservation. For your relaxation, you can also book a massage session.

Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast every morning and relax in the lounge area of the Maison de Caroline. A garden with terrace is provided as well.

The nearest local bus stop is 100 metres away from the property. Sibiu International Airport is 73.5 km away. Restaurant is closed from Mon 14 Jan 2019 until Wed 01 May 2019
La Maison de Caroline is closed from Mon 02 May 2022 until Sun 22 May 2022
Bar is closed from Mon 02 May 2022 until Sun 22 May 2022
Please note that on outdated GPS maps you have to use the following address: Str. Rubin Patitia, 11.

Please note that pet are accepted only upon request and if confirmed by the property.

Description:
Only a 15-minute walk away from the Fortress of Alba Iulia, Casa Traiana offers a restaurant with a terrace, serving Romanian and international dishes.

Rooms here have soundproofed windows, cable TV and telephone. All are fitted with a minibar, and toiletries are provided in the bathroom.

Free Wi-Fi is also available at Hotel Casa Traiana. Cars can be rented at the 24-hour reception, and the distance to Sibiu Airport is about 70 km. In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), this property is taking steps to help protect the safety of guests and staff. Certain services and amenities may be reduced or unavailable as a result.
Spa and gym facilities at this property are unavailable due to Coronavirus (COVID-19).
Please note that the GPS address is: Str. Stefan Manciulea 49A, Alba Iulia.

Please note that the property accepts holiday vouchers issued by Romanian companies, as a payment method.

Description:
Located 100 metres from the train station in Alba Iulia, Pensiunea Neptun features air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and free Wi-Fi in all areas. A restaurant with a bar is on site as well.

All accommodation units are equipped with a TV, minibar and 2 arm chairs. Each unit comprises a private bathroom with a shower.

Transylvanian cuisine is served on-site. Additional facilities include a courtyard with a garden and childrens playground.

Pensiunea Neptun is 2 km from the ruins of Roman Castrum of Apulum, the Romanian Orthodox Cathedral and the Union Museum. Private parking is possible on site for free.

Description:
Located in Alba Iulia, Pensiunea MA features a restaurant with a terrace and air-conditioned rooms with cable TV and a minibar. Free WiFi is available.

All rooms are decorated in warm colours with floral and romantic motifs. They include a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served each morning.

The MA Pensiunea features a childrens playground. The centre of Alba Iulia is 1 km away, while the citys main points of interest are all reachable within 2 km.

Private parking is possible on site for free. A bus stop is 300 metres away, and the train station is 3 km away.

Description:
Situated in Alba Iulias centre, Hotel Cetate Imparatul Romanilor offers free guarded parking and free Wi-Fi. It has a spacious restaurant serving traditional Romanian cuisine as well as international dishes.

The rooms and suites are equipped with cable TV and minibars. They have carpeted floors and antique-style, elegant furniture.

At the richly decorated reception of the Imparatul Romanilor a transfer to and from Sibiu Airport as well as tickets to numerous cultural events in Alba Iulia can be organised.

Free parking is available. A train station can be reached within 2 km.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Alba Lulia Citadel

Location : Located in Alba Iulia, Hotel Transilvania is within a 5-minute drive of Roman Castrum Ruins and Orthodox Church. This 4-star hotel is 1.2 mi (2 km) from Orthodox Cathedral and 1.4 mi (2.2 km) from Framm s.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 80 guestrooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Dining : Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel s restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Continental breakfasts are served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM and on weekends from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges

  • Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve cribs/infant beds and rollaway/extra beds
  • This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted

Special Instructions : Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description: Situated in a residential area, Pensiunea Marylou offers spacious rooms with free WiFi, just 1.2 km away from Alba Iulias historic area and the Roman Catholic Cathedral. The air-conditioned rooms of Marylou Pension are decorated with classical wooden furniture. All rooms have a seating area with a sofa, a work desk, and a private bathroom with a bathtub, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Guests can start their day with a breakfast at Pensiunea Marylous restaurant. Pensiunea Marylou also offers a sauna, laundry facilities, car rental, and an airport shuttle for a surcharge. Free private parking is available on site. Alba Iulias historic area is a 15-minute walk from Pensiunea Marylou, and features the Batthyaneum Library, the Orthodox Cathedral, Union Hall, Apor Palace, and the Princely Palace. Please inform Pensiunea Marylou in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. If you require an invoice when booking a prepaid rate, please write this request and your company details in the Ask a question box. Parking is subject to availability due to limited spaces. This property is located in a residential area and guests are asked to refrain from excessive noise. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties. Please note extra bed rates vary according to season. If arriving with children, please inform the property in advance about their number and respective ages. You can use the Special Requests box when booking or contact the property.

Description:
The stylish Hotel Mariss enjoys an easily accessible location on the edge of Alba Iulia, and offers its guests air-conditioned accommodation, on-site restaurant and bar, and free WiFi throughout the property.

Featuring modern décor, all rooms come equipped with a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. Each unit also comprises an en-suite bathroom, provided with a hairdryer and toiletries.

The reception at the Mariss hotel is opened 24 hours. Additional services include airport shuttle and safety deposit, both available at an additional cost. The on-site parking is for free.

Hotel Mariss is within 300 metres from Alba Iulias bus and train station. The towns fortress is reachable in 1 km. Kindly note that this hotel is not fitted with an elevator and rooms are accessible only via stairs.

Description:
HeadLine : Near Alba Lulia Citadel

Location : Located in Alba Iulia, Vila Elisabeta is within a 5-minute drive of Orthodox Cathedral and Framm s. This hotel is 1.3 mi (2.1 km) from Catholic Cathedral and 1.4 mi (2.3 km) from Alba Lulia Citadel.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 25 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars (stocked with some free items) and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks, housekeeping is provided daily, and irons/ironing boards can be requested.

Dining : Grab a bite at one of the hotel s 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM.

Description:
Set in the old centre of Alba Iulia, in a historical palace inside the Alba Carolina Fortress, Hotel Medieval offers elegant accommodation with classical-style furniture, as well as free parking on site.

The spacious and comfortable rooms feature free WiFi and an LCD cable TV, as well as a private bathroom with a bath or a shower, free toiletries, a hairdryer, a bathrobe and slippers.

Guests at Medieval Hotel have access to an à la carte restaurant and a bar with an outdoor terrace. Other restaurants and shops can be found within 150 metres.

The hotel offers guests free access to the Three Fortifications at Alba Carolina. At a surcharge, guests can also rent bicycles or practice horse riding in the equitation centre.

The nearest bus stop is 200 metres from the property, while the train station is 3 km away.

Description:
Located in Alba Iulia and within a 6-minute car ride of Alba Carolina Citadel, Hotel Tara features an on-site restaurant and non-smoking rooms. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

Rooms come with parquet floors and private bathrooms and free toiletries. A TV with cable channels is also provided.

Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property is at guests disposal around-the-clock. At the on-site bar, you can unwind in front of a drink after a busy day, or start your morning with a coffee.

The centre of the town is located 3 km from Hotel Tara. The nearest airport is Sibiu International Airport, 80 km from Hotel Tara.

Description:
The Vila Steaua Nordului is situated in a quiet neighbourhood, 1.5 km from the historical centre. The property features both an outdoor and an indoor swimming pool. On-site wellness facilities include a sauna. WiFi is available free of charge.

Each of the en-suite rooms at the Steaua Nordului is equipped with its own private balcony.

Guests can relax next to the cosy fireplace in the common lounge. The hotel restaurant serves traditional regional dishes as well as international cuisine.

Popular nearby attractions include the historic Alba Iulia Citadel, 2 km from the house. The Unirea Stadium lies 300 metres away, and there is an Olympic swimming pool 100 metres away.

HeadLine : Near Alba Lulia Citadel

Location : Located in Alba Iulia, Crown Royal Pensiune is within a 5-minute drive of Orthodox Cathedral and Orthodox Church. This pension is 1.7 mi (2.8 km) from Sala Unirii and 1.7 mi (2.8 km) from Framm s.

Rooms : Stay in one of 8 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Enjoy a satisfying meal at Bistro Crown Royal serving guests of Crown Royal Pensiune. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge.

Description:
Citadel Hostel is a place which you could call home. It is small, cozy and quiet and its location makes it a perfect choice for those who wish to be in walking distance from Alba Iulias main attractions. We try to make all our guests feel that they belong here, even if they stay only for one night. There is free coffee and tea, an open air lounge and someone at the reception will do their best to help with information, a free map, or even book trip tickets for you. It is friendly place which you will most certainly not forget. Quietly located 500 metres from the centre of Alba Iulia and 1 km from the Old Town Citadel, Hostel Citadel offers functionally-furnished, carpeted rooms and dormitories with private bathrooms, as well as free WiFi access.

All the bright, air-conditioned rooms of Citadel Hostel feature individual and functional décors, with wall drawings. For the cold season, they are fitted with central heating. Guests will find a locker in the quadruple rooms, and they can also use the free luggage storage.

The private yard and the terrace offer you the opportunity to relax and socialize, while complimentary coffee and tea are offered. Free parking is available on site and motorcycles can be parked in the yard.

A 250-year old Jewish cemetery museum can be found 50 metres away, and a historic brick synagogue, the oldest in Transylvania, is 700 metres away.  The Alba Iulia Dendrological Park is 3.8 km away, and there are shops and a hypermarket within walking distance from the hostel. Please inform Citadel Hostel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required for peak dates (for example, Christmas, Easter etc). The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Children under 18 years old cannot check-in without the presence of an adult.

Description:
Located in Alba Iulia, a 10-minute walk from the city centre, Complex Prestige offers free WiFi, a shared terrace, a restaurant, kids playground and a bar. Free private parking is available on site, and the closest bus stop is 250 metres away.

The rooms of Complex Prestige come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and a bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Bed linen and towels are provided, as well.

Breakfast is served daily at the property and dinner can be enjoyed at the in-house restaurant. In addition, guests can savour drinks at the bar. The closest shop can be found within 100 metres.

Further amenities include a billiards and ping pong table, as well as a dart board.

The closest train station is situated 2 km from the Complex Prestige, while the Medieval Fortress is 1.5 km away. Please note that this property accepts holiday vouchers state-approved by Romanian companies.

Description:
Camere-Apartament Steyna is a 3-star property situated in Alba Iulia. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 32 km from Câlnic Citadel.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms also feature a kitchenette with an oven, a microwave and a stovetop. At Camere-Apartament Steyna the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Alba Iulia Citadel - The Third Gate is 1.2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Sibiu International Airport, 75 km from Camere-Apartament Steyna. Please inform Camere-Apartament Steyna in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Description:
Located 2.5 km from Alba Carolina Citadel in Alba Iulia, Vila Transylvania Inn features free WiFi access and free private parking. The hotel has a seasonal outdoor pool

All rooms come with a TV.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. There is a barbecue, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.

The nearest airport is Sibiu International Airport, 77 km from Vila Transylvania Inn.

Description:
Located in Alba Iulia, just 500 meters from the Citadel Alba Carolina, Hotel Parc offers free WiFi in all areas, a restaurant with Romanian and international cuisine and an outdoor terrace.

All rooms and suites at Hotel Parc are equipped with air conditioning, carpeted floors, minibar, flat-screen TV with cable channels and private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries.

Every morning, guests can start their day with a breakfast buffet. Luggage storage is also provided.

Free access to the spa facilities, which include an indoor swimming pool and 2 saunas, is offered. Massage services are available at an extra charge.

The property is 1.5 km from the railway and bus station in Alba Iulia. Aeroportul International Sibiu is at 73 km. Please inform Hotel Parc in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Pension Terra is peacefully located in Alba Iulia, 100 metres away from an Olympic-size swimming pool. It offers free WiFi, and spacious rooms with a balcony and a hydro-massage shower.

The local bus stop is 50 metres away and provides a transport link to the Alba Iulia Train Station, 3 km away.

The town centre is 2 km from the Terra. There, guests can visit the ruins of the Roman Castrum of Apulum and gates of the Alba Iulia Fortification. Restaurant is closed from Mon 02 May 2022 until Sat 31 Dec 2022
Piscina Terra is closed from Mon 02 May 2022 until Wed 01 Jun 2022

Description:
Offering air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, Crema Residence is situated in Alba Iulia,  just a 5-minute car ride from Alba Carolina Citadel. Unirii Park is 1 km away.

The apartments and rooms feature bright color tones with pastel accents. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The apartments feature fully-equipped kitchens. Some units have dining areas and balconies. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer in every unit.

At this property, you will also find banquet facilities for private events, which can accommodate up to 30 people, for an extra charge. Free private parking is offered on-site, depending on availability. Street parking is also possible.

Turda Salt Mine is 71 km from here. The nearest airport is Sibiu International Airport, 74 km from Crema Residence. Please inform Crema Residence in advance of your expected arrival time. The preferred airport for Ave Alba is Sibiu (SBZ) - 72.8 km / 45.3 mi
Description:
HeadLine : Near Framm s

Location : A stay at Ave Alba places you in the heart of Alba Iulia, within a 10-minute walk of Orthodox Cathedral and Unification Museum. This 4-star bed & breakfast is 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Sala Unirii and 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Framm s.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 13 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Dining : Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 7:30 AM to 9:30 AM and on weekends from 8:00 AM to 10 AM for a fee.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve rollaway/extra beds
  • This property accepts credit cards
  • Safety features at this property include a first aid kit
  • Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property
  • Guests who may encounter issues with stairs should contact this property in advance. Elevators are not available.

Special Instructions : The front desk is open daily from 8:00 AM - 10 PM. This property doesn t offer after-hours check-in. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 24 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property in advance for check-in instructions. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation.
